The goal is to make the score as high as possible, the music is in a constant loop and at the end of a loop, the game accelerates. There are 2 types of enemies : one rushes towards the player, the other one turns while getting closer. There are 3 different shot types, the player can switch between them using the directional arrows. The current shot is displayed in the iPod (color of the album). The shoots are in rhythm : green for piano, yellow for snare and red for kick. Finally, the life bar is in the ipod as well, it is symbolized by the music bar.

Thanks for playing and don't hesitate to bring us some feed back 

Enjoy !
